products.title: Genesis Black Roller Blind
products.description: The genesis black roller blind makes the perfect finishing touch to a modern, monochrome scheme. The practical roller design with its sleek lines and black fabric looks smart and stands out against white for an overall effect that is eye-catching yet minimalist. The lightweight dimout fabric creates a stylish window covering that offers privacy when required without dominating your space. Product id: sdb-rbx1786 fabric colour: black material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis black roller blind in black.

products.title: Genesis Black Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This crisp perfect fit black roller blind will look great in any room in your home and will add a touch of style. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws.
